column9: Pair shell on bottom with gem on top, such that slice goes between gem and neighboring isolated corner, to get tent/tent.

column8: Good scottie/bird; the clean slice between the tent and corner on top breaks squareshape when preserving the kite on bottom.
column9: Position isolated corner on top next to the slice, and hold D kite in DL; first move trades isolated corner on top with two edges on bottom to make good thumbs.
